thread.title: CL: Real Madrid players can make you pay in seconds, says Cavani
thread.title_full: CL: Real Madrid players can make you pay in seconds, says Cavani - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: CL: Real Madrid players can make you pay in seconds, says Cavani
text:
*Paris:* Paris Saint-Germain striker Edinson Cavani says Real Madrid can "make you pay in seconds" as the teams prepare to clash in the Champions League today.
*Paris Saint-Germain forward Edinson Cavani. Pic/Getty Images*
Both the Ligue 1 leaders and their La Liga counterparts have won their opening two games of the ... Â»
